docs.text: CI/CD Pipeline: SonarCloud: DevSetGo Common Library ¶ NOTE: This is a beta version and not ready for use. A set of common functions wrapped into a package, so I don't have to write the same code over and over. Oh and it makes the code more reusable.... or something like that. Testing ¶ Test on Windows, Linux, and MacOS. Since I work in Windows and Linux and don't use MacOS, it is only tested via Github Actions for MacOS. Let me know if there is any issue. Library Functions ¶ file_functions CSV File Functions JSON File Functions Text File Functions Folder Functions Make Directory List Changes Directory List
